text: TR 4.7 LBA,HTM and TM HTM: It is a TM that always halts for every input. TM: It halts for every valid string and for invalid strings either halts at “non final state” or “never halts”. LBA: It is HTM but length of the tape we use linearly bounded. e LBA accepts CSL languages. e HTM accepts recursive languages. e TM accepts Recursive Enumerable (RE) languages.
